directions: Mix zucchini, tomatoes, bell pepper, celery, onion, tomato soup, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a stock pot; stir and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until the zucchini is tender, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed tomato soup (such as Campbell's®)  (Optional)
title: Italian Zucchini Soup
